summary: In Osaka's slum, capricious folks without futures engage in pilfering, assault and robbery, prostitution, and the trading of ID cards and blood.
cast: Kayoko Honoo|Kôji Nakahara|Masahiko Tsugawa|Fumio Watanabe|Isao Sasaki|Yûsuke Kawazu|Junzaburô Ban|Kamatari Fujiwara|Tanie Kitabayashi|Eitarô Ozawa|Asao Koike|Kei Satô|Jun Hamamura|Hôsei Komatsu|Gen Shimizu|Rokkô Toura|Bokuzen Hidari|Ichirô Nagai|Kunie Tanaka|Kunie Tominaga|Kyu Ito|Tsunagorô Rashômon
title: El entierro del sol
